import React, { Component, Route, Router } from "react"; import logo from "../img/logook.jpg"; import HirdetesekComponent from "./HirdetesekComponent"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; class Header extends Component { state = { activated: false, activatedLogin: false, body: null, headers: null, }; loginClk() { axios.request("http://localhost:8090/oauth/token", { headers: { contentType: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", authorization: "Basic " + btoa("CLIENTID:SECRET"), data: "grant_type=password&username=szika@gmail.com&password=oassword", }, }); } loginMenu = () => { this.setState({ activatedLogin: !this.state.activatedLogin, }); }; toggleMenu = () => { this.setState({ activated: !this.state.activated, }); }; render() { const activat = this.state.activated ? "show" : ""; const activated = this.state.activatedLogin ? "show-login" : ""; return (
